Finally found hometown Chinese food in Bronx! The fried chicken is crispy.. The fried noodles are delicious. The spring rolls with chili are delicious...

Awesome food and service. Boneless chicken here is very underrated from the community. However, their cooking style is key to all their dishes. The only thing is there are times I crave their food for them to be closed unexpectedly some days.

Nothing wrong with Xin Rong! Haha
Their always prompt and fast with deliveries. I always get their chicken wings with pork fried rice. I tried their fried wontons with cheese in which I thought were crab Rangoon‚Äôs because when I asked if it was the same, they said yes and sadly it wasn‚Äôt! If you want fried cheese then okay but I was expecting cream cheese and sadly it wasn‚Äôt. Their fried dumplings with pork are pretty good and really fulfilling as well! None the less this will always be my go to Chinese food restaurant in Hunts Point.
Ordered boneless spare ribs with fried rice and there was 2 hairs that I saw, who knows if there was more. Threw it away immediately. Waste of money Disgusting
Ordered on UberEats and found pieces of hair in my food. Absolutely disgusting.
Really good food!!!
Love the place and get great customer service for take out as phone orders.  The food is yummy and great on days l don't want to cook.  Great having my neighborhood restaurante.

Everything prompt clean and tasteful.....best of NYC experience.
